data.name: XConfigurationChangeListener
desc: A listener for configuration changes is called when it has been registered at the configuration controller and a configuration change occurs.

methods.name: notifyConfigurationChange
desc: The exact time of when a listener is called (before the change takes place, during the change, or when the change has been made) depends on the change event.
The order in which listeners are called is the order in which they are registered (First registered, first called.)
